title: State attorneys general warn Microsoft, OpenAI, Google, and other AI giants to fix ‘delusional’ outputs
description: The letter demanded companies institute new safeguards to keep users safe from harmful psychological impacts.
content: The letter demanded companies institute new safeguards to keep users safe from harmful psychological impacts.
